#Text= Asami says : " Without that sale , I do n't know how much longer I can keep my company going .

column1: #Text=What am I gon na do ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Do n't worry .
#Text=I 'm gon na find whoever 's responsible .
#Text=Chief Beifong is about to question the captain of the ship .
#Text=" Lin says : " I know it 's been a long day , but walk me through what happened .
#Text=" Captain says : " We were ambushed about thirty klicks outside the harbor .
#Text=We never heard them coming .
#Text=" Lin says : " This is the third attack this week at about the same location .
#Text=" Lu says : " Yep , and smack - dab in Republic City 's jurisdiction , which means another problem for us .
#Text=All this stress is gon na turn old black beauty gray .
#Text=" Gang says : " It 's got ta be Northern Water Tribe .
#Text=They 're trying to stop supply lines to the South .
#Text=" Lin says : " I agree .
#Text=Is there anything else about the attack you remember ?
#Text=Anything unusual ?
#Text=" Captain says : " There is one thing .
#Text=The bombs exploded in a way I 've never seen before .
#Text=They did n't have fuses .
#Text=It was like they were being detonated remotely .
#Text=" Mako says : " Like the bombs at the cultural center .
#Text=" Asami says : " Wait , where are you going ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I got ta grab some evidence .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Asami , I heard the news .
#Text=I ca n't believe they took my fifth favorite ship in the Varrick Industries fleet !
#Text=Named her after my mom .
#Text=Rest in piece , Rocky Bottom .
#Text=" Asami says : " Without the money from that shipment , Future Industries is almost broke .
#Text=" Mako says : " Chief , I think there 's a link between this attack and the attack at the cultural center .
#Text=" Lin says : " What do you think you 're doing ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Solving this case .
#Text=Did any of the people who attacked you have one of these in their hand ?
#Text=I think it 's a remote detonator .
#Text=" Captain says : " It was too dark to see anything .
#Text=" Lin says : " Mako !
#Text=" Mako says : " Chief , I do n't think the people who attacked were Northern Water Tribe .
#Text=" Gang says : " Of course they were Northern Water Tribe .
#Text=They were waterbending .
#Text=" Mako says : " Was this one of the guys who attacked ?
#Text=" Captain says : " No , I do n't recognize him .
#Text=" Gang says : " Oh , that 's embarrassing .
#Text=" Lu says : " Nice try , Rookie .
#Text=" Lin says : " Mako , leave .
#Text=Now .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Great work , everybody .
#Text=Another open and shut case for the dynamic mustachioed duo !
#Text=" Asami says : " Wait , I think Mako might be onto something .
#Text=" Mako says : " Chief , I know it 's a long shot , but I have an idea how we can catch these guys .
#Text=" Lu says : " Yeah , let 's all listen to the rookie .
#Text=" Asami says : " He 's doing a better job than you !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Whooooo 's hungry ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Enough !
#Text=I do n't want to hear your lame - brained rookie ideas .
#Text=You 're a beat cop , not a detective .
#Text=Now hit the street and do your job !
#Text="
